result.title: ICPC friendly warning â€” beware of dogs
result.content: Hi. Near the Le Meridien hotel (and also probably all around the Phuket) you can meet unfriendly homeless dogs. If you don't want them to attack you, try avoiding them and hold big stone in your hand (to make them afraid of you, not to throw at them :f). One of them bite me yesterday in the leg from behind (2 mins walk from hotel) even though I didn't tease him or anything and I needed to go to hospital to take rabeis and tetanus vaccinations. So don't worry about me, but be careful about yourself, I don't want any of you to experience similar troubles.
